Controls.Name: __.TableNotRegisterIncomingDoc_Count
Controls.Title: Văn bản đến chưa vào sổ (<%=value%>)

props.paginatorTemplate: FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink CurrentPageReport
props.onRowDoubleClick: ({data}) => { let gridName = '__.TableRegisteredIncomingDoc:#__.TableNotRegisterIncomingDoc'; let resetData = () => { refreshGrid(gridName) }; toDoFormRef?.current?.OpenIncomingDocument(data, gridName, resetData);  }
